se.cbb.jprime.seqevo

Class SubstitutionMatrixHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.seqevo.SubstitutionMatrixHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfoProvider

    public class SubstitutionMatrixHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements InfoProvider
    Handles transition probabilities of a Markov process for molecular sequence evolution. As such, it can be viewed as a representing a momentary transition rate matrix Q, as well as a transition probability matrix P for some user-set Markov time w.

    The momentary transition rate matrix Q can be decomposed into a symmetric exchangeability matrix R and the vector of stationary frequencies Pi. The transition probability matrix P over a given (Markov) time interval w is given by P=exp(Qw). Note that w often is measured in the expected number of events per site occurring over the interval.

    Assumes time reversibility, that is, pi_i*mu_ij=pi_j*mu_ji for stationary frequencies pi_x and transition probabilities mu_xy.

    Author:
    Bengt Sennblad., Lars Arvestad., Joel Sj√∂strand.

        public static final double MAX_MARKOV_TIME
        The maximum allowed time w on which transition rate matrix Q can act.

        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubstitutionMatrixHandler

        public SubstitutionMatrixHandler(java.lang.String modelName,
                         SequenceType sequenceType,
                         double[] R_vec,
                         double[] Pi_vec,
                         int cacheSize)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of substitution model.
        sequenceType - sequence type.
        R_vec - 'intrinsic' rate matrix, in row-major format. Time reversibility is assumed, therefore, its length should be dim*(dim-1)/2, where dim is the alphabet length.
        Pi_vec - stationary frequencies. Should have length dim, where dim is the alphabet length.
        cacheSize - number of P matrices to store in cache, e.g., 1000.

    • Method Detail

      • isCompatible

        public boolean isCompatible(MSAData sd)
        Tests if model and the submitted data are compatible. This could be used as an early error-catcher.
        Parameters:
        sd - sequence data.
        Returns:
        true if compatible; false if incompatible.

      • updateTransitionMatrix

        public void updateTransitionMatrix(double w)
        Sets up P=exp(Qw), the transition probability matrix for the Markov process over 'time' w (where 'time' is not necessarily temporal). Precondition: w <= 1000.
        Parameters:
        w - the "time" (or branch length) over which Q acts.

      • multiplyWithP

        public void multiplyWithP(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F X,
                 org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F Y)
        Performs matrix multiplication Y=P*X for the current P.
        Parameters:
        X - operand matrix (typically vector) of size (dim,ncol).
        Y - resulting matrix Y=P*X. Should have size (dim,ncol).

      • getLeafLikelihood

        public void getLeafLikelihood(int state,
                     org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F result)
        Returns the likelihood for a certain leaf state for the current P. This corresponds to the state's column in P (and analogously for ambiguity characters.
        Parameters:
        state - the state's integer index.
        result - the column values. Should have size (dim,1).

      • multiplyWithPi

        public void multiplyWithPi(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F X,
                  org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F Y)
        Element-wise multiplication Y=Pi*X.
        Parameters:
        X - operand matrix (typically vector) of size (dim,ncol).
        Y - resulting matrix Y=Pi*X. Should have size (dim,ncol).
